snippet.title: Official RIVE Release Trailer (PlayStation 4 & Steam)
snippet.description:
RIVE is finally out!!! Almost three years in the making, our final game can now be played on PlayStation 4 and Steam!

Check out http://www.rivethegame.com for more!
